get.description: Provides metadata service for the MTConnect Devices information model for all devices.

parameters.name: deviceType
parameters.description: Values are 'Device' or 'Agent'. Selects only devices of that type.

parameters.name: pretty
parameters.description: Instructs the result to be pretty printed

parameters.name: count
parameters.description: Maximum number of entities to include in results

parameters.name: device
parameters.description: Device UUID or name

parameters.name: pretty
parameters.description: Instructs the result to be pretty printed

parameters.name: removed
parameters.description: Boolean indicating if removed assets are included in results

parameters.name: type
parameters.description: Only include assets of type `type` in the results

put.summary: Upload an asset by identified by `assetId`
put.description: Updates or adds an asset with the asset XML in the body

parameters.name: device
parameters.description: Device UUID or name

parameters.name: type
parameters.description: Only include assets of type `type` in the results

post.summary: Upload an asset by identified by `assetId`
post.description: Updates or adds an asset with the asset XML in the body

parameters.name: device
parameters.description: Device UUID or name

parameters.name: type
parameters.description: Only include assets of type `type` in the results

delete.summary: Delete all assets for a device and type
delete.description: Device and type are optional. If they are not given, it assumes there is no constraint

parameters.name: device
parameters.description: Device UUID or name

parameters.name: type
parameters.description: Only include assets of type `type` in the results

get.description: Returns a set of assets identified by asset ids `asset` separated by semi-colon (;)

parameters.name: assetIds
parameters.description: Semi-colon (;) separated list of assetIds

put.description: Updates or adds an asset with the asset XML in the body

get.description: Gets a stapshot of the state of all the observations for all devices optionally filtered by the `path`

parameters.name: at
parameters.description: Sequence number at which the observation snapshot is taken

parameters.name: deviceType
parameters.description: Values are 'Device' or 'Agent'. Selects only devices of that type.

parameters.name: interval
parameters.description: Time in ms between publishing data–starts streaming

parameters.name: path
parameters.description: XPath to filter DataItems matched against the probe document

parameters.name: pretty
parameters.description: Instructs the result to be pretty printed

get.description: Provides metadata service for the MTConnect Devices information model for all devices.

parameters.name: deviceType
parameters.description: Values are 'Device' or 'Agent'. Selects only devices of that type.

parameters.name: pretty
parameters.description: Instructs the result to be pretty printed

get.description: Gets a time series of at maximum `count` observations for all devices optionally filtered by the `path` and starting at `from`. By default, from is the first available observation known to the agent

parameters.name: count
parameters.description: Maximum number of entities to include in results

parameters.name: deviceType
parameters.description: Values are 'Device' or 'Agent'. Selects only devices of that type.

parameters.name: from
parameters.description: Sequence number at to start reporting observations

parameters.name: heartbeat
parameters.description: Time in ms between publishing a empty document when no data has changed

parameters.name: interval
parameters.description: Time in ms between publishing data–starts streaming

parameters.name: path
parameters.description: XPath to filter DataItems matched against the probe document

parameters.name: pretty
parameters.description: Instructs the result to be pretty printed

parameters.name: to
parameters.description: Sequence number at to stop reporting observations

get.description: Provides metadata service for the MTConnect Devices information model for device identified by `device` matching `name` or `uuid`.

parameters.name: device
parameters.description: Device UUID or name

parameters.name: deviceType
parameters.description: Values are 'Device' or 'Agent'. Selects only devices of that type.

parameters.name: pretty
parameters.description: Instructs the result to be pretty printed

put.summary: Non-normative PUT to update a value in the agent
put.description: The data of the PUT contains the dataItem=value observation data

parameters.name: device
parameters.description: Device UUID or name

post.summary: Non-normative POST to update a value in the agent
post.description: The data of the POST contains the dataItem=value observation data

parameters.name: device
parameters.description: Device UUID or name

get.description: Gets a stapshot of the state of all the observations for device `device` optionally filtered by the `path`

parameters.name: device
parameters.description: Device UUID or name

parameters.name: at
parameters.description: Sequence number at which the observation snapshot is taken

parameters.name: deviceType
parameters.description: Values are 'Device' or 'Agent'. Selects only devices of that type.

parameters.name: interval
parameters.description: Time in ms between publishing data–starts streaming

parameters.name: path
parameters.description: XPath to filter DataItems matched against the probe document

parameters.name: pretty
parameters.description: Instructs the result to be pretty printed

get.description: Provides metadata service for the MTConnect Devices information model for device identified by `device` matching `name` or `uuid`.

parameters.name: deviceType
parameters.description: Values are 'Device' or 'Agent'. Selects only devices of that type.

parameters.name: pretty
parameters.description: Instructs the result to be pretty printed

get.description: Gets a time series of at maximum `count` observations for device `device` optionally filtered by the `path` and starting at `from`. By default, from is the first available observation known to the agent

parameters.name: device
parameters.description: Device UUID or name

parameters.name: count
parameters.description: Maximum number of entities to include in results

parameters.name: deviceType
parameters.description: Values are 'Device' or 'Agent'. Selects only devices of that type.

parameters.name: from
parameters.description: Sequence number at to start reporting observations

parameters.name: heartbeat
parameters.description: Time in ms between publishing a empty document when no data has changed

parameters.name: interval
parameters.description: Time in ms between publishing data–starts streaming

parameters.name: path
parameters.description: XPath to filter DataItems matched against the probe document

parameters.name: pretty
parameters.description: Instructs the result to be pretty printed

parameters.name: to
parameters.description: Sequence number at to stop reporting observations
